results.name: Expansion of Product_{k>=1} (1 + x^(2*k) - x^(3*k)).
link: Vaclav Kotesovec, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
Vaclav Kotesovec, Graph - The asymptotic ratio (100000 terms)
mathematica: RootReduce[QPochhammer[Root[-1 + # + #^3 &, 1], x] QPochhammer[Root[-1 + # + #^3 &, 2], x] QPochhammer[Root[-1 + # + #^3 &, 3], x] + O[x]^70][[3]] (* _Vladimir Reshetnikov_, Nov 20 2016 *)
